Table of Contents

Class Simulation

Namespace
SimulationFramework
Assembly
SimulationFramework.dll

The base class for all simulations. Inherit this class or use Create(Action<AppConfig>, Action<ICanvas>) to create a simulation.

public abstract class Simulation

Properties

Application

This simulation's application.

If this simulation has been initialized (any overload of Run() has been called), this property will not be null. 

public Application? Application { get; }

Property Value

Application

Create(Action<AppConfig>, Action<ICanvas>)

Creates a simulation from the provided callbacks.

public static Simulation Create(Action<AppConfig> initialize, Action<ICanvas> render)

Parameters

initialize Action<AppConfig>

The delegate to call when simulation initializes.

render Action<ICanvas>

The delegate to call when simulation renders.

Returns

Simulation

A simulation which uses the provided delegates.
